threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2915 no green light
threads.message: Did you try a known good magsafe board? Just measuring voltages here is not enough, either test it on a known good board or get another magsafe board.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2915 no green light
threads.message: Ok Q7085 bad.I replaced is working now.Thanks
